content:

title: Viacom18 SDE-2 (JioCinema) | Enlyft | Offer Evaluation
content:
Ex - 4+ YOE

Current -
Company: Service Based Org
Title/Level: Data Engineer
Location: Surat (Full remote)
Base Salary: INR 27L
Performance Bonus: INR 5.4L (20% of Base)
Yearly: INR ~32 LPA
Techstack - BigQuery, Cloud Composer, GCP (Redundant work)

Offer In Hand -
Company: JioCinema (Viacom18)
Title/Level: SDE 2 - Data
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: INR 34L
10% Bonus: INR 3.4L
Yearly: INR ~38L (Around 50k for Health Insurance)
Techstack - Primarily GCP (DataProc, BigQuery, GCS)

Company: Enlyft
Title/Level: Software Engineer - Data
Location: Pune
Relocation Bonus: INR 75K
Base Salary: INR 39L
Performance Bonus: INR 4L
Stock Option: Paper Money, No use
Yearly: INR ~43L
Techstack - Databricks, Snowflake, Azure
They haven't registered the company in India yet, so it's a contract position under their US subsidiary. Taxes will only apply to 50% of the salary.
Since it's a contract position, there won’t be any PPF deductions or insurance coverage.

I believe the learning opportunities at Enlyft will be greater, but it lacks brand recognition. On the other hand, JioCinema offers better future prospects due to its strong brand value.

**Please suggest me which one would be better in terms of learning and career growth.**

title: Microsoft | L59 | India | New Grad (PPO) | 2025 Batch
content:
* **Education**: BTech in Computer Science at Tier 3 University, 2021 - 2025 Batch
* **Years of Experience**: 0
* **Prior Experience**: Interned at Microsoft Summer 2024
* **Date of the Offer**: Received PPO after the Internship
* **Company**: Microsoft
* **Title/Level**: SDE-1 / L59
* **Location**: Hyderabad/Bangalore/Noida
* **Base**: 15L INR
* **Relocation**: 3L INR (non-taxable) + 59k INR (taxable)
* **Signing Bonus**: 5L INR
* **Stock bonus**: 35K USD (29.3L INR approx) vested for four years (25% + 25% + 25% + 25%) 
* **Bonus**: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of Base every year (max potential 3L)
* **Total comp (Base + Relocation + Bonus + Stock)**: ~55.9L INR

title: Walmart | Myntra | Offer Evaluation
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE
Years of Experience: 3.2 yrs
Prior Experience: fintech startup - SDE -2
Current Compensation : CTC : 28 LPA -( Fixed: 24.2 LPA + Variable : 2.4 LPA + Esops : 1.5 LPA)
**Myntra -- offer**
	Date of the Offer: Sep 2024
	Company: Myntra 
	Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer 
	Location: Bangalore 
	Salary: 33 LPA
	Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0 
	Stock bonus - Esops : USD 21533 (INR 18 LPA approax) 
	Bonus: 3.6 LPA
	Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 36.7 Base + 4.5 LPA Esops  = 41.2 LPA
	Work Mode : Hybrid 
	
**Walmart -- offer**
	Date of the Offer: Aug 2024
    Company: Walmart 
    Title/Level: SDE - III
    Location: Bangalore 
    Salary: 26 LPA 
    Signing Bonus: 3 LPA
    Stock bonus - RSU :  RSU + NRSU - 4.15 LPA - per year ( 12.45 LPA vested 3 years ) 
    Bonus: 4.9 LPA
    Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  first year : 38.05 LPA , second year : 35.05 LPA
   	Work Mode : Hybrid 
   
   
   Note : Please give your suggestion on offers.

title: Oracle (OCI) IC-3 SMTS (Bengaluru) | Amazon SDE-2 (Hyderabad) | Evaluation
content:
Education: B.Tech in EE (Top IIT)
Years of Experience: 5+ Years
Prior Experience: Paytm
Current Compensation: 31 CTC

Date of the Offer: Sep 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE-2 / L5
Location: Hyderabad (4-5 Work from office)
Salary: 45lpa fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1.5 lpa
Stock bonus: Around 35lpa (5 + 15 + 40 + 40)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 64lpa (including fixed, sign on and RSUs)
Benefits: Standard Amazon Benefits

Company: Oracle OCI
Title/Level: SMTS / IC-3
Location: Bengaluru (Will be Work from Home as of now)
Salary: 40lpa fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3.5 lpa
Stock bonus: Around 70lpa (25% / year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 60lpa (including fixed, sign on and RSUs)
Benefits: Standard Oracle Benefits

Currently a bit consfused as Struggling to decide as in oracle it is work from office but work from office is not very good thing for professional growth it do have its benefits where as Amazon has a very Hustled culture and Job security issues, work life balance also not good, So getting confused which one to go with.
